column3: 2015 at 10:00 a.m. at the First Missionary Baptist Church in Cave City with Bro. Ron Canard officiating. Burial will follow in the Cave City Cemetery with arrangements by Qualls Funeral Home of Cave City.  Visitation will be Sunday
column5: 2015 from 6:00 until 8:00 p.m. at the First Missionary Baptist Church in Cave City.
